ðŸ“– Summary: Dia is a text-to-speech model that generates highly realistic dialogue in a single pass. It allows for conditioning on audio to control emotion and tone, and can produce nonverbal cues. The repository provides access to pretrained model checkpoints and inference code for research purposes, focusing on English language generation.
